markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hungry Goblin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1008) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Fang Sharpener](/Feats.aspx?ID=1000)

</column>

---

You’ll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict persistent bleed damage with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.
name: Hungry Goblin
